txt.en: Ingi Steambeard has been hard at work fashioning armour for the dwarves that defend Gondamon, and now he is ready to eat.

'I have been assembling armour for the guards of this city for what seems like days, and I have developed an appetite! I don't have time to prepare dinner. If you can bring me something, I'll give you some coins and materials for the favour!

'I don't want just anything, though. Bring me some roast pork and two hard biscuits.

'Actually, make that two servings of roast pork! Just one won't be enough to keep me going!'

Ingi Steambeard is at Gondamon, in the Low-lands of Ered Luin.\n\nIngi Steambeard is hungry and wants you to bring him two servings of roast pork and two hard biscuits with which to feed his appetite.
'This food looks delicious, [placeholder]! Thank you very much, and here is your payment!'

Ingi Steambeard is at Gondamon, in the Low-lands of Ered Luin.\n\nIngi Steambeard is hungry and wants you to bring him two servings of roast pork and two hard biscuits with which to feed his appetite.
'I'm hungry! Where are my two servings of roast pork and my hard biscuits?'
Bring roast pork and hard biscuits to Ingi Steambeard
